Indian Economy.title: ‘GST 2.0 has brought smiles on faces of businessmen’: BJP MP, trader body chief
Indian Economy.summary: MP Praveen Khandelwal, who is a prominent businessman from Old Delhi, says the GST rejig will result in more accurate tax return filings, more spending power

Indian Economy.title: India needs 40x surge in non-fossil energy to meet Viksit Bharat 2047 vision: CII-EY report
Indian Economy.summary: EY-CII report outlines India's energy transition challenges and requirements for becoming a developed economy by 2047.

Indian Economy.title: India GST rate cut: Consumption boost vs capital expenditure dilemma
Indian Economy.summary: The government’s sweeping GST rate cuts promise a boost to consumer spending, but India still effectively has a five-slab system. Revenue loss could also force cuts in capital expenditure. Will this Diwali gift for consumers work out well for India’s economy?

Indian Economy.title: US GDP growth revised up to 3.8% in Q2, fastest in nearly two years
Indian Economy.summary: U.S. GDP grew 3.8% in Q2 2025, the fastest in nearly two years, lifted by consumer and business spending plus a shrinking trade deficit. Growth to slow in H2

Indian Economy.title: India’s GDP grows 7.8% in Q1; resilience shines amid global uncertainty: FM Sitharaman
Indian Economy.summary: India’s resilience was not accidental and it reflects proactive fiscal and monetary policies, bold structural reforms, massive infrastructure creation.

Stock Market.title: Nifty breaks below 25,000 mark as markets tumble for 5th straight session
Stock Market.summary: Concerns over US’ H-1B visa fee hike and persistent FII selling continued to weigh heavily on market sentiment

Stock Market.title: Nifty hovers near 25,000 mark as global headwinds persist
Stock Market.summary: Markets open lower, Nifty struggles near 25,000; investors advised to maintain cautious buy-on-dips strategy amid global volatility.

Stock Market.title: Nifty Prediction Today – September 25, 2025: Nifty futures: Intraday trend unclear at the moment
Stock Market.summary: Nifty 50 opens slightly lower, with top gainers Bharat Electronics and Hindalco Industries, and top losers Tata Motors and Asian Paints.

Stock Market.title: Nifty Bank Prediction Today – September 25, 2025: Nifty Bank futures: Price action indicates uncertainty
Stock Market.summary: Key levels for Nifty Bank futures (September) are at 55,150 and 55,450

Stock Market.title: Sensex, Nifty slip below key levels as selling pressure intensifies
Stock Market.summary: Benchmark indices slide below 25,000 as selling pressure mounts, Nifty Bank resilient, Tata Motors leads losers.

Startups & Funding.title: Advent-backed KreditBee kickstarts fresh fundraise, hires bankers; eyes filing next year
Startups & Funding.summary: Advent-backed KreditBee eyes $120 mn pre-IPO fundraise led by Nomura, ICICI Sec as peers Kissht, Fibe, and Moneyview weigh listings; profit jumps 66% in FY25 to  ₹473 crore.

Banking & Finance.title: Day 1 of GST cut: 6-fold surge in credit card online payments to Rs 10,000 crore
Banking & Finance.summary: Just a day earlier, on September 21, credit card transactions had amounted to a modest Rs 1,514 crore across 36.16 lakh purchases. The GST relief set off a consumption frenzy, and by the next day, transactions had surged to nearly 95 lakh.

Banking & Finance.title: Indian economy resilient despite global headwinds; RBI bulletin flags growth, fintech, UPI surge
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI Bulletin September 2025 highlights India’s five-quarter high growth, resilient NBFCs, rising UPI adoption, falling inequality, and strong reforms.

Banking & Finance.title: Elderly lawyer loses Rs 1.8 crore in ‘digital arrest’ scam, fraudsters pose as CBI officers
Banking & Finance.summary: An FIR was registered on Wednesday by the lawyer at the Cyber Crime police station of Pimpri Chinchwad police. Between September 4 and 19, the complainant was coerced into making over a dozen transfers to four mule accounts totalling Rs 1.8 crore.

Banking & Finance.title: Lending & payment apps more likely to get installed than banking apps: Report
Banking & Finance.summary: Among the three sectors under study -- payment, lending and banking, 11 apps with payment or lending as their primary business are more likely to be installed than banking, it added.

Banking & Finance.title: Rupee recovers 7 paise from all-time low to close at 88.68/$
Banking & Finance.summary: Rupee strengthens against US dollar amid RBI intervention, global trade concerns, and domestic market volatility.

Technology Sector.title: Indian Railways Round Trip Scheme: Over 9,000 tickets booked via IRCTC, RailOne app
Technology Sector.summary: Indian Railways Round Trip Tickets: Indian Railways’ Round Trip Package scheme has seen record bookings since its launch on August 14.

Technology Sector.title: Kaleshwaram project probe: Telangana HC grants relief to former CMO secretary Smita Sabharwal until October 7
Technology Sector.summary: Smita Sabharwal, who served as secretary to KCR, has sought to quash the Ghose Commission report after it held her responsible for negligence in the Kaleshwaram Lift Irrigation Project.

Technology Sector.title: ‘Trump sees China as economic rival, not in geopolitical sense…in this vision, India no longer enjoys priority’

Technology Sector.title: Accenture’s AI momentum underscores growth potential for Indian IT firms
Technology Sector.summary: Experts, however, caution that macroeconomic pressures, US outsourcing policies, and hiring slowdowns could temper near-term momentum

Technology Sector.title: From independent kingdom to strategic frontier: Why Ladakh is integral to India’s history and geopolitics
Technology Sector.summary: Amid the recent protests in Leh, a look at how Ladakh became a part of Jammu and Kashmir and its enduring significance to India.
